h1_38: University of California (San Diego) Medical Center Program
h3_39: University of California (San Diego) Medical Center
span_48: University of California (San Diego) Medical Center
p_65: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_69: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_82: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_100: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_103: We provide an excellent, educationally-rich, resident-run program; rigorous training for private or academic medicine. We offer a 4-year diagnostic pathway, a 5 year diagnostic/research pathway, and a 5-year integrated DR/IR pathway as well as a separate option to apply for our ESIR track. We offer advanced-modality training. We value diversity, well-being, and public and global health initiatives.
